title: Pixel 2 Battery drain after update to Android 11
content:
I upgraded to Android 11 in the System settings (OTA) since then I have massive battery issues. My phone lasts around 4h without use after charged to 100%. The phone feels constantly warm.

System settings don't show any suspicious app. I rebooted twice already. 

Any idea what I could do to fix the issue? 

Thanks for your help!
